data.eml:eml: The presence of species of Pseudochironomus Malloch 1915 (Diptera: Chironomidae) in watercourses of Chaco Serrano Ecoregion (Argentina, South America)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paggi, Analía C., Rodriguez Garay, Gretel N. (2015): The presence of species of Pseudochironomus Malloch 1915 (Diptera: Chironomidae) in watercourses of Chaco Serrano Ecoregion (Argentina, South America). Zootaxa 3957 (3): 334-341, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.3.6
